Container.Name: mkv-language-remover
Container.Overview:
The purpose of this container is to go through your movies directory and convert all mp4 and m2ts file to mkv and then remove a specific language from those movies. It will also remove commentaries if set to true
Please run this on a subset of your data before your entire library
There is not web UI, Just look at the logs for output
WARNING: THIS RUNS AS SOON AS YOU START IT
Find the language codes at https://iso639-3.sil.org/code_tables/639/data

Config.Name: movies
Config.Description: Set this to your movies library location Example: /mnt/user/data/media/movies

Config.Name: Languages
Config.Description: Enter a comma seperated list of three letter ISO 639-3 language codes, Example: rus, eng

Config.Name: Convert
Config.Description: Set to True if you want the container to convert all mp4 and m2ts files to mkv

Config.Name: Remove Languages
Config.Description: Set to False if you don't want to remove any languages

Config.Name: Remove Commentary
Config.Description: Set to True if you want to remove all commentary audio tracks from your library
